Hercules: "We’ll see about that."

name: Who's With Me?
action:
Your characters get +2 ※ this turn.
Whenever one of your characters with Reckless challenges another character this turn, gain 2 lore.
flavour: "Don't forget, the purple unicorn is mine!"

name: Potion of Might
action: <mark>VILE CONCOCTION</mark> 1 ⬡, Banish this item – Chosen character gets +3 ※ this turn. If a Villain character is chosen, they get +4 ※ instead.

name: The Sword Released
action: <mark>POWER APPOINTED</mark> At the start of your turn, if you have a character in play with more ※ than each opposing character in play, each opponent loses 1 lore and you gain lore equal to the lore lost.

name: Ruby Chromicon
action: <mark>RUBY LIGHT</mark> ↷ − Chosen character gets +1 ※ this turn.
flavour:
“Leave fear behind.”
−Inscription

name: Sugar Rush Speedway
title: Starting Line
action: <mark>ON YOUR MARKS!</mark> Once per turn, you may ↷ chosen character here and deal them 1 damage to move them to another location for free.

name: Ratigan's Party
title: Seedy Back Room
action: <mark>MISFITS’ REVELRY</mark> While you have a damaged character here, this location gets +2 ◆.

name: King Candy
title: Sovereign of Sugar
flavour: “My sweet subjects, I can without a pinch of hesitation assure you that I have never been so happy.”

name: Chaca
title: Impressive Daughter
flavour: Look, look! My tooth is even looser today!

name: The Queen
title: Cruelest of All
action: Ward (Opponents can’t choose this character except to challenge.)
flavour: She’d seen what the ink could do for other glimmers. What could it do for her?

name: Scrooge McDuck
title: Afficionado of Antiquities
flavour: “The secret room should be right here! Ach, I cannot believe I paid a whole penny for this map.”

name: Prince John
title: Opportunistic Briber
action: <mark>TAXES NEVER FAIL ME</mark> Whenever you play an item, this character gets +2 ※ this turn.
flavour: “Of course I’m on the list. Check under ‘PJ.’”

name: Merlin
title: Back from Bermuda
action: LONG LIVE THE KING! Your Arthur characters give Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1)
flavour: “A little rest and relaxation will do your health good, boy.”

name: Pacha
title: Emperor's Guide
action:
HELPFUL SUPPLIES At the start of your turn, if you have an item in play, gain 1 lore.
PERFECT DIRECTIONS At the start of your turn, if you have a location in play, gain 1 lore.

name: The Queen
title: Fairest of All
action:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 ⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named The Queen.)
Ward (Opponents can’t choose this character except to challenge.)
REFLECTIONS OF VANITY For each other character named The Queen you have in play, this character gets +1 ◆.

name: Sheriff of Nottingham
title: Bushel Britches
action:
EVERY LITTLE BIT HELPS For each item you have in play, you pay 1 ⬡ less to play this character.
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their ※ to another chosen character’s this turn.)

name: Chicha
title: Dedicated Mother
action:
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their ※ to another chosen character’s ※ this turn.)
ONE ON THE WAY During your turn, when you put a card into your inkwell, if it’s the second card you’ve put into your inkwell this turn, you may draw a card.

name: Prince John
title: Gold Lover
action: <mark>BEAUTIFUL, LOVELY TAXES</mark> ↷ – Play an item from your hand or discard with cost 5 or less for free, exerted.
flavour: A villainous schemer from day to night.

name: The Queen
title: Crown of the Council
action:
Ward (Opponents can’t choose this character except to challenge.)
GATHERER OF THE WICKED When you play this character, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may reveal any number of character cards named The Queen and put them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Kuzco
title: Selfish Emperor
action:
OUTPLACEMENT When you play this character, you may put chosen item or location into its player’s inkwell facedown and exerted.
BY INVITE ONLY 4 ⬡ − Your other characters gain Resist +1 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

name: Mufasa
title: Ruler of Pride Rock
action:
A DELICATE BALANCE When you play this character, exert all cards in your inkwell, then return 2 cards at random from your inkwell to your hand.
EVERYTHING THE LIGHT TOUCHES Whenever this character quests, ready all cards in your inkwell.

name: Ludwig Von Drake
title: Self-Proclaimed Genius
flavour: “So you see, there’s a dark void at the edge of Lorcana. A complete absence of electromagnetic radiation! What’s it made of? I don’t know! The light’s just gone. Kaput!”

name: Minnie Mouse
title: Quick-Thinking Inventor
action: <mark>CAKE CATAPULT</mark> When you play this character, chosen character gets -2 ※ this turn.
flavour: This puts the Frosting Flinger 2000 to shame.

name: Basil
title: Practiced Detective
action: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their ※ to another chosen character's ※ this turn.)
flavour:
“This case is as good as solved!”
−Basil

name: King Candy
title: Sweet Abomination
action:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 ⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named King Candy.)
CHANGING THE CODE When you play this character, you may draw 2 cards, then put a card from your hand on the bottom of your deck.

name: Donald Duck
title: Focused Flatfoot
action: <mark>BAFFLING MYSTERY</mark> When you play this character, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.
flavour: "There’s just gotta be one of those chromi-thingies around here somewhere!"

name: Tanana
title: Wise Woman
action: <mark>YOUR BROTHERS NEED GUIDANCE</mark> When you play this character, you may remove up to 1 damage from chosen character or location.

name: Tipo
title: Growing Son
action: <mark>MEASURE ME AGAIN</mark> When you play this character, you may put a card from your hand into your inkwell facedown and exerted.
flavour: "Mom, Mom! I think I’m still growing!"

name: Belle
title: Of the Ball
action:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
USHERED INTO THE PARTY When you play this character, your other characters gain Ward until the start of your next turn.

name: Merlin
title: Intellectual Visionary
action:
Shift 5 You may pay 5 ⬡ to play this on top of one of your characters named Merlin.)
OVERDEVELOPED BRAIN When you play this character, if you used Shift to play him, you may search your deck for any card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle your deck.

name: Vision of the Future
action: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Put one into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
flavour: “We must repair the Illuminary before it’s too late. And we’ll need these devices, these chromicons, to fix it.”

name: Royal Tantrum
action: Banish any number of your items, then draw a card for each item banished this way.
flavour: “I am King! King! King!”

name: Ever as Before
action:
(A character with cost 2 or more can ↷ to sing this song for free.)
Remove up to 2 damage from any number of chosen characters.
flavour:
Ever just as sure
As the sun will rise

name: Hide Away
action: Put chosen item or location into its player’s inkwell facedown and exerted.
flavour:
Fauna: "Oh my! We dropped some . . ."
Merryweather: "You mean you dropped some!"

name: All Funned Out
action: Put chosen character of yours into your inkwell facedown and exerted.
flavour: “Pretty pathetic, huh?”

name: Medal of Heroes
action: <mark>CONGRATULATIONS, SOLDIER</mark>↷, 2 ⬡, Banish this item − Chosen character of yours gets +2 ◆ this turn.
flavour:
“You have etched in the rock of virtue a legacy beyond compare.”
–General Hologram

name: Basil's Magnifying Glass
action: <mark>FIND WHAT’S HIDDEN</mark> ↷, 2 ⬡ - Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may reveal an item card and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
flavour: "I say, a piece of the Hexwell Crown!" -Basil

name: Merlin's Carpetbag
action: <mark>Hockety Pockety</mark> ↷, 1 ⬡ – Return an item card from your discard to your hand.
flavour:
“What a way to pack!”
–Arthur

name: Sapphire Chromicon
action:
POWERING UP This item enters play exerted.
SAPPHIRE LIGHT ↷, 2 ⬡, Banish one of your items – Gain 2 lore.
flavour:
“Knowledge is eternal.”
–Inscription

name: The Great Illuminary
title: Radiant Ballroom
action: WARM WELCOME Characters with Support get +1 ◆ and +2 🛡️ while here.
flavour: Every surface glows with the joy of celebration.

name: Merlin's Cottage
title: The Wizard's Home
action: <mark>KNOWLEDGE IS POWER</mark> Each player plays with the top card of their deck face up.

name: Stitch
title: Team Underdog
action: <mark>HEAVE HO!</mark> When you play this character, you may deal 2 damage to chosen character.
flavour: He's not the biggest glimmer on the team, but he still packs a wallop.

name: Jafar
title: Tyrannical Hypnotist
action:
Challenger +7 (While challenging, this character gets +7 ※.)
INTIMIDATING GAZE Opposing characters with cost 4 or less can’t challenge.
flavour: “No one will keep me from the broken crown!”

name: Simba
title: Lost Prince
action: <mark>FACE THE PAST</mark> During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may draw a card.
flavour: "This is my kingdom. If I don't fight for it, who will?"

name: Rudy
title: Groove Disrupter
flavour: “The Illuminary can’t handle this much groove! We have to keep the noise down or it’ll fall apart for sure!”

name: Royal Guard
title: Bovine Protector
flavour: “Hey, I’ve been turned into a cow. Can I go home?”

name: Mickey Mouse
title: Food Fight Defender
action: Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)
flavour: Underestimating him is a recipe for disaster.

name: Sleepy
title: Sluggish Knight
action: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

name: Kronk
title: Unlicensed Investigator
action: Challenger +1 (While challenging, this character gets +1 ※.)
flavour: “Maybe this one’s a chromicon. Probably not. I really should have paid more attention when that wizard guy was talking . . .”

name: HeiHei
title: Protective Rooster
action: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your character must chose one with Bodyguard if able.)
flavour: Who’s the "boat snack" now?!

name: Dopey

name: Namaari
title: Resolute Daughter
action:
I DON’T HAVE ANY OTHER CHOICE For each opposing character banished in a challenge this turn, you pay 2 ⬡ less to play this character.
Resist +3 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 3.)

name: Snow White
title: Fair-Hearted
action: NATURAL LEADER This character gains Resist +1 for each other Knight character you have in play. (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1 for each other Knight.)
flavour: Friendship is the best armor of all.

name: Yzma
title: Unjustly Treated
action: <mark>I'M WARNING YOU!</mark> During your turn, whenever one of your characters banishes a character in a challenge, you may deal 1 damage to chosen character.
